name: Carioca Drill
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Arms relaxed at sides or out for balance
Face forward (perpendicular to direction of travel)
steps: Cross trailing foot behind lead foot
Step laterally again with lead foot
Cross trailing foot in front of lead foot
mistakes: Turning shoulders instead of facing forward
Crossing feet too wide (loss of balance)
safety: Start slow to master coordination. Clear space to avoid tripping.

prescriptionHints.notes: Great for hip mobility, coordination, and agility warm-up.

joints.notes: Keep hips mobile and rotate smoothly. Avoid excessive twisting.
